headline.main: Time Warner Backs Ad Optimization Startup AdMeld

abstract: AdMeld, one of several start-ups promising to help online publishers optimize their advertising, has attracted new backing from both the venture and media world. It just raised a $15 million third round led by Norwest Venture Partners, with contributions from Time Warner Investments.
